item.title: Branding, Brand Identity, Rebranding and Package Design for Today's Leaders
item.description:
Branding, Brand Identity, Rebranding and Package Design for Today's Leaders

"David Brier is brilliant with branding." says Daymond John of Shark Tank. Helping companies defy gravity and rise above the noise, this is how it's done.

item.title: The Exact Formula I Use to Create Killer Headlines
item.description:
The Exact Formula I Use to Create Killer Headlines

"Those who tell the best stories, win." Seen on the Web "Make a bold mark. Not a dull impression." The Internet Emails. Texts. Video ads. TV commercials. Billboards. "Alerts" on our smart phones (i.e., reminders, calendar events, beacon notifications, push notifications, et al). It's endless.

item.title: The Italian Cookie That Changed My World
item.description:
The Italian Cookie That Changed My World

(The original title of this post was "How an Italian Cookie Became a Noise-canceling Device" but then I thought, that might require too much explanation for anyone who has never gotten lost in the hypnotic moment of divine deliciousness, leaving the outside world to carry on at whatever decibel level it desired.

item.title: The 4 Traits of an Exceptional Brand
item.description:
The 4 Traits of an Exceptional Brand

Exceptional brands aren't born, they're made. Let me explain. "The best way to be missed when you're gone is to stand for something when you're here." "Quit or be exceptional. Average is for losers." "Sure, ideas that spread win. But ideas that don't get spoken always fail."
